dict.acceptation: [语]声调，语调；[画]色调，色泽，明暗；[乐]乐音，全音，全音程；[医]（正常的）健康状态；
使更健壮；定调；使变调子；[摄影术]给…上色；
带有某种腔调；呈现某种色彩；（颜色）调和（与 with 连用）；

sent.orig: The input and output impedance of MRF18030 transistor are obtained by 2-tone load-pull method.
sent.trans: 采用2-tone负载牵引法得到了LDMOS晶体管MRF18030的输入和输出阻抗。

sent.orig: There are four types of grammatical tone-variations: light tone-variation, soft tone-variation, narrow tone-variation and pronoun tone-variation.
sent.trans: 语法变调主要包括：轻声化、轻音化、仄声支配式首字变调和代词所有格变调。

sent.orig: English has four basic types of intonation: the falling tone, the rising tone-rise tone-fall tone.
sent.trans: 英语中有四种基本语调：降调、升调、降升调、升降调。

sent.orig: Neutral tone is much shorter tone and is identified by the absence of tone mark.
sent.trans: 轻声的音长比重读短得多，而且不标调号。

sent.orig: There is only one Ru tone, though during tone sandhi, a sandhi tone 3 is produced.
sent.trans: 入声只有一个？但在变调时会产生一个变调3。
